URL: https://www.performancehyperbaric.com/
# Performance Hyperbaric LLC
> Integrative wellness and regenerative medical clinic in Stuart and Jensen Beach, Florida, providing hyperbaric oxygen therapy and advanced wellness treatments to enhance healing, recovery, and overall health.
> This file lists LLM-ready summaries of our pages, including short Q&A for context.

URL: https://www.performancehyperbaric.com/hyperbaric-oxygen
## Hyperbaric Oxygen
- Hyperbaric Oxygen in Stuart, Florida: Unlocking the Healing Power of Hbot. Providing advanced hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT) to enhance oxygen absorption, promote healing, reduce inflammation, and support overall wellness and recovery.
- **Q:** What are the benefits of this therapy?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric lists benefits including faster injury recovery, reduced inflammation, improved energy, better cognitive function, and overall wellness support.
- **Q:** How does HBOT help with injuries?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric helps the body repair tissues and heal faster, making it useful for injuries like sprains or strains.
- **Q:** Can HBOT improve mental focus or brain health?
- **A:** Yes, Performance Hyperbaric notes that hyperbaric oxygen therapy may help enhance cognitive function and memory.

URL: https://www.performancehyperbaric.com/iv-therapy
## IV Therapy
- IV Therapy in Stuart, Florida. IV vitamin therapy that delivers a blend of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants directly into the bloodstream to support hydration, boost energy, and strengthen the immune system.
- **Q:** How does IV therapy help with hydration?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric’s IV therapy rapidly restores hydration and replaces essential minerals lost from daily activities or dehydration.
- **Q:** Can IV therapy support the immune system?
- **A:** Yes, Performance Hyperbaric’s IV therapy can help support the immune system, especially for people with chronic colds or low energy.
- **Q:** What kinds of IV drips are offered?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric offers signature IV drips like Get‑Up‑and‑Go, Inner Beauty, Immunity, Quench, and Brain Power.

URL: https://www.performancehyperbaric.com/infared-sauna
## Infrared Sauna
- Infrared Sauna in Stuart, Florida. Offering full‑spectrum infrared sauna therapy, using infrared heat to help the body relax, detoxify, improve circulation, relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and support skin health and muscle recovery.
- **Q:** What are some benefits of the infrared sauna sessions?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric’s infrared sauna sessions can help with detoxification, improved circulation, pain relief, muscle recovery, reduced inflammation, and enhanced skin health.
- **Q:** How long do typical infrared sauna sessions last?
- **A:** At Performance Hyperbaric, infrared sauna sessions generally last about 15 to 30 minutes.

URL: https://www.performancehyperbaric.com/exosome-therapy
## High Intensity PEMF
- High Intensity PEMF in Stuart, Florida. Offering high‑intensity PEMF (Pulsed Electromagnetic Field) therapy using the HUGO system, to stimulate cellular activity, enhance circulation and oxygenation, and support detoxification.
- **Q:** How long do the therapy sessions usually last?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric’s PEMF therapy sessions typically last about 3 to 12 minutes.
- **Q:** What does PEMF therapy use to stimulate the body?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric’s PEMF therapy uses electromagnetic fields to stimulate the body at a cellular level.

URL: https://www.performancehyperbaric.com/intramuscular-injections
## Intramuscular Injections
- Intramuscular Injections in Stuart, Florida. Providing a wellness service that delivers essential vitamins directly into the muscle to ensure faster and more effective nutrient absorption, support energy, and metabolism.
- **Q:** What is the advantage of intramuscular vitamin injections compared to taking vitamins orally?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric’s intramuscular injections bypass the digestive system, so the body absorbs nutrients more quickly and effectively.
- **Q:** What types of benefits can you expect from these injections?
- **A:** Performance Hyperbaric’s intramuscular vitamin injections can boost energy levels, support immune function, and help with overall wellness.
